Projects

  • Todo App

    Personal Project (SPA)

    This was a React app I created in order to learn the how the library works and get familiar with using it. Classic CRUD with native drag and drop functionality, theme toggler and local storage.

  • Beercans & Co

    Business Site (Brochure)

    This was the first website I built in order to learn the basic of web development. A simple static site for a business including an image carousel and contact form.
